english.segment1: VERSE 1. All around the world. You hear now's the time. Break the chains and hold them high. Hold them high
english.segment2: We were made for such a time as this. To make a difference. In the world we live. Now we live
english.segment3: CHORUS. Who's dancing who's singing. Who's living a life worth living. We are we are we're shining. The light of salvation. Who's running who's loving. Who's breaking the doors wide open. We are we are we're shining. The light of salvation
english.segment4: VERSE 2. Old has turned to something new and beautiful. Broken dreams are coming true. They're coming true
english.segment5: CHORUS 2. Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!. We're shining the light of salvation. Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!. We're shining the light of salvation
english.segment6: BRIDGE. We have made our choice we are. We are a generation with one voice to shout. Of Your salvation
